title: Spanx on a Plane
description:
Jackie is back on American soil and recaps her trip, all the pop culture happenings she missed and why she shouldn’t carry mace.

This Episode of the Bitch Bible is proudly sponsored by:

Thrive Market: Go to Thrivemarket.com/Bible for $60 in free groceries and a free 30-day membership.

Carbon 38: Head over to Carbon38.com and get 20% off your order by using promo code Bible at checkout.
